reviews.review_msg: He is definitely one of the more challenging profs in the Ling department. His lectures are very interesting, but his exams are VERY DIFFICULT! They require you to memorize insignificant detail in the textbook. If you are looking for a GPA booster, avoid his class.

Dean should not all the time read the notes he prepared at home.  He should DELIVER lectures, not read them.    
 Also, he should make sure that his students are alert in class and not fall asleep.
